entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:26 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 01:01 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: WSW 35 km/h gust 67 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to a few flurries late this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
